text: Lionel "Little Train" James (May 25, 1962 â€“ February 25, 2022) was an American professional football player. He was a running back for the San Diego Chargers in the National Football League (NFL) from 1984 until 1988. He played college football for the Auburn Tigers. James was born in Albany, Georgia. James died on February 25, 2022 at the age of 59. ==References== Category:1962 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American football running backs Category:San Diego Chargers players Category:Sportspeople from Georgia (U.S. state) Category:People from Albany, Georgia
title: Lionel James
